document.text:
From: " " 
To: 
Cc: an 
Subject: Epstein 
Devices SW 
Date: Thu, 25 Jun 2020 16:13:20 +0000 
Attachments: SW for all_JE_electronic_devices_v5.docx 
=and 
Attached is a draft search warrant affidavit seeking authorization to expand the scope of our search of Epstein's devices. 
Thank you so much for your help pulling together the information for this. I leftMas the affiant because I believe he 
swore out the most recent warrant, but let me know if I should switch it to Mandy instead. 
Our hope is to get this to Judge Gorenstein this afternoon and swear it out tomorrow. Whichever of you will be the 
affiant, would you please call me with any corrections/edits to the affidavit? You'll see there's one question in there from 
Ted about whether we've seen any photos of Maxwell on the discs seized from the NY residence that I'm hoping you can 
help me answer. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York. NY 10007 
EFTA00020232
